titles.title: Amnesty Bonuses Elimination Act
A bill to prohibit the issuance of social security numbers to individuals given deferred action under the President's immigration executive actions.
Amnesty Bonuses Elimination Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Amnesty Bonuses Elimination Act
This bill amends the Social Security Act to prohibit the Social Security Administration from issuing a Social Security account number to any alien granted deferred action pursuant to specified deferred action policies of the Department of Homeland Security.
